what: Timing and Duration Analysis of Solar Eclipses Across U.S. States in 2024
title: Timing and Duration Analysis of Solar Eclipses Across U.S. States in 2024
text: goal solarEclipses provide easy access clean structured data solar eclipses analysis visualization. R package includes detailed information various types solar eclipses, total annular eclipses, along key attributes, including date, location, duration, name.

title: Timing and Duration Analysis of Solar Eclipses Across U.S. States in 2024
text: can install development version solarEclipses GitHub :
code: # Install the development version from GitHub devtools::install_github("Fengz924/solarEclipses")

title: Timing and Duration Analysis of Solar Eclipses Across U.S. States in 2024
text: basic example shows load dataset. following code allow see summary dataset: can also embed plots, example: Plot showing eclipse durations geographic locations.
code: library(solarEclipses) data("clean_eclipse_data") summary(clean_eclipse_data) #>     state               name                lat             lon          #>  Length:4141        Length:4141        Min.   :27.22   Min.   :-124.45   #>  Class :character   Class :character   1st Qu.:34.79   1st Qu.: -97.30   #>  Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Median :38.54   Median : -89.08   #>                                        Mean   :37.76   Mean   : -91.06   #>                                        3rd Qu.:41.09   3rd Qu.: -83.68   #>                                        Max.   :46.91   Max.   : -67.43   #>   eclipse_1          eclipse_2          eclipse_3          eclipse_4         #>  Length:4141        Length:4141        Length:4141        Length:4141        #>  Class :character   Class :character   Class :character   Class :character   #>  Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Mode  :character   #>                                                                              #>                                                                              #>                                                                              #>   eclipse_5          eclipse_6            duration         Type           #>  Length:4141        Length:4141        Min.   :137.8   Length:4141        #>  Class :character   Class :character   1st Qu.:150.7   Class :character   #>  Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Median :154.3   Mode  :character   #>                                        Mean   :157.2                      #>                                        3rd Qu.:159.2                      #>                                        Max.   :191.7 plot(clean_eclipse_data$duration)

title: Launch the Shiny app — launch_app
text: function launches Shiny app included package.
